description: its service contract between two companies of different regions where one of the company is providing service of repair of Ship and vessels
full_summary:
=====================

**VISSC II Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number:** PW-_SLE-008-29100
**Publication Date:** June 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 28, 2023, 14:00:00

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing this announcement to inform suppliers of the cancellation of the Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) process number W8483-197521/B and the re-issued ITQ process number W8483-197521/C.

**Contract Details:**
The cancelled ITQ process pertains to the procurement of ships and vessels repair, refits, and conversions services, as specified in the associated GSIN code JX1990A. The end-user entity for this contract is the Department of National Defence.

**Tender Requirements:**

* Trade Agreement: None
* Tendering Procedure: Suppliers may submit a bid
* Delivery Date: To be determined
* Language: Documents may be submitted in either English or French

**Contact Information:**

DiNiro, Robert
Email: robert.diniro@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 203-3973
Fax: ( none )
Address: 11 Laurier St., Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

**Acquisition Strategy:**

The PWGSC reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Additional Information:**

The tender description, including the notice, can be accessed via the Canadabuys website at the following links:

English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/06/21/34f227440587a64a5d12b7e4783f37a5/ABES.PROD.PW_SLE.B008.E29100.EBSU000.PDF
French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/06/21/80ab93cccae9a0adaa40e5dd0fa46053/ABES.PROD.PW_SLE.B008.F29100.EBSU000.PDF

Please note that this tender announcement is for information purposes only and is not an invitation to tender. Suppliers who are interested in participating in this procurement are advised to review the tender documents carefully and ensure they meet the requirements outlined in the Canadabuys website. [1
